title: GridTap
description: GridTap is a cloud-based utility billing software that manages billing, payments, customer accounts, and reporting. The software will operate on a  subscription model, with pricing based on the number of subscribers or customers onboarded.

title: PixelForge E-Commerce API
description: PixelForge's Backend API that handles the users, cart, products and orders.

title: PixelForge E-Commerce Web-App
description: This project was created as the final project for my time in the Zuitt Bootcamp Training
